physical_appearance:This is a red silk brocade skirt. It features a gold brocade pattern with bird motifs
 and a floral motif panel along the hem. The waistband of the skirt is green. It is a mid-length skirt.

sgcool_label_text:This brocade skirt would have been used by the Jain community in Kutch.
